There are times I ...

attachments.displayName:
Fashion Session - Patricia Kurtz
©2013 Lexy Page Photography
All Rights Reserved

There are times I forget my sense of "gratitude" for the craft I so adore.  I get caught up in my own negative outlook that I miss the gifts that come to me on a daily basis. When I step out from behind that dark shadow of doubt I'm quickly presented with the reminder that "gratitude" comes in many forms.  Patricia is a living reminder to me.  What a gift she is, not only in the studio but in life as well!

Happy Friday everyone!  November is here.  Holidays are quickly approaching.  I hope each of you can enjoy a peaceful and serene weekend!

Sharing this today with #trueportraits  +True Portraits  & +Ray Bilcliff  Also sharing with #pinkcircle   & +Cheryl Cooper & +Lynn Langmade  And I can't forget my friend over at #everythingisbeautiful  the gracious host +Brad Buckmaster 

#fashionphotography   #fashionshoot   #fashion   #fashionphotographer   #modelphotography   #modelshoot
